name: Tap Strike BOOM!
description:
Give your brain the next big challenge with "Tap Strike BOOM!"

Your goal is to go through the "Mystical Gate of the Heavens", but it won't just let anyone in!

Heavily influenced by the 'Voltorb Flip', a minigame in the Pokemon series, Tap Strike BOOM! challenges yo to solve the puzzles that the gate will throw at you. You will have 10 levels that will get more difficult as you advance!

Clear each level by finding a number of crystals, but only Double and Triple Crystals will do! If you find a bomb, you will lose a life!

Can you find out what's behind this gate?

Features:

- Challenging mechanics that will make you use the old noodle!

- Beautiful pixelated graphics.

- Haunting chiptune music and 16-bit sound effects.

This game can be played on Windows tablets as well! :)
